title: PNG to ICO Converter - Free & Online | miconvert.com
sub_title: Convert PNG images to ICO format online for favicons and desktop icons. Free, fast, and no watermarks.
hint: Upload your PNG image to start converting...
description:
Transform your PNG to ICO for perfect favicons and desktop icons! Our free PNG to ICO converter creates professional multi-size icons that look crisp across browsers and Windows desktops.

ICO files can bundle several sizes in a single file (e.g., 16–256 px), ideal for favicons and app/shortcut icons. Transparency from PNG is preserved for smooth edges on dark/light backgrounds.

head.title: Convert PNG to ICO Online - Free PNG to ICO Converter | miconvert.com

head.og_title: PNG to ICO Converter - Free & Online
head.og_description: Convert PNG images into ICO format for favicons and desktop icons. 100% free, fast, and secure.

h1.title: Convert PNG to ICO Online
h1.description: Free and fast PNG to ICO converter for favicons and desktop icons. Works instantly on any device, no signup required.

h2.title: Why Convert PNG to ICO?
h2.description:
ICO is built for icons:

  • Multi-size support: Bundle 16–256 px variants in one file.
  • Favicon standard: Recognized by major browsers.
  • Windows compatibility: Native desktop/app icon format.
  • Transparency: Smooth edges with PNG alpha preserved.

h2.title: How to Convert PNG to ICO Online
h2.description:
1. Click Upload PNG and select your image.
  2. Wait for processing and optimization.
  3. Click Download ICO to save your icon.

We generate common icon sizes automatically.

h2.title: ICO Format Specifications
h2.description:
• Standard sizes: 16×16, 32×32, 48×48, 64×64, 128×128, 256×256 px
  • Color depth: Up to 32-bit RGBA
  • Transparency: Full alpha channel
  • Structure: Header + multiple image entries
  • Compression: PNG-compressed entries for 32-bit icons (Vista+)

h2.title: Supported Limits & Formats
h2.description:
• Accepted input: PNG (image/png)
  • Maximum file size: up to 16 MB per file
  • Output: ICO (.ico, MIME image/x-icon)

h2.title: Troubleshooting
h2.description:
• Favicon not showing: Clear cache and ensure /favicon.ico at site root with <link rel="icon" href="/favicon.ico">.
  • Jagged edges: Start from a larger, high-contrast PNG; downscale cleanly.
  • Upload fails: Make sure PNG ≤ 16 MB.

h2.title: Features of Our PNG to ICO Converter
h2.description:
• 100% Free with no watermarks
  • Automatic size optimization
  • Transparency preservation
  • Secure processing

faq.question: Is this PNG to ICO converter free?
faq.answer: Yes, the converter is completely free with no hidden charges or subscriptions.

faq.question: What sizes are supported in ICO files?
Can I use ICO files for website favicons?
faq.answer: Yes. favicon.ico is widely supported by major browsers.

faq.question: What file sizes are supported?
faq.answer: You can upload images up to 16 MB per file.

faq.question: Are my files safe?
faq.answer: Files are processed automatically and not retained longer than necessary for conversion.

faq.question: Will the icon quality be good?
faq.answer: We preserve PNG transparency and generate multiple sizes for crisp rendering at small dimensions.

note: For best results, use a clear, high-contrast PNG. Place /favicon.ico at your site root and reference it with <link rel="icon" href="/favicon.ico">.
